info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 3:45AM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Northern and eastern Panhandles. * WHEN...From this evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will start in the early morning hours across the north and reach the southeast in the late morning to early afternoon. The north will see better snow accumulations on Wednesday. The southeast will see better snow accumulations on Thursday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
